Package CAMs_App.service

Class AuthService

java.lang.Object
CAMs_App.service.AuthService
Direct Known Subclasses:
AuthStaffService, AuthStudentService
public abstract class AuthService extends Object
The abstract class AuthService used as a base for authentication services in this application. The class contains static method for logging out a user and a protected method for authentication.
Since:
2023-10-25

  • Constructor Details

    • AuthService

      public AuthService()

  • Method Details

    • login

      public abstract boolean login(String UserID, String password)
      Logs in the user with provided userID and password
      Parameters:
      UserID - : User ID to log in
      password - : Associated password with the User ID
      Returns:
      true upon successful login, else false

    • logout

      public static boolean logout()
      Logs out the current user by setting the currentuser and current camp to null, writing the data to database.
      Returns:
      true after successful logout

    • authenticate

      protected static boolean authenticate(User user, String password)
      Authenticates the user by comparing the entered password with the user's stored password
      Parameters:
      user - : The authenticated user
      password - : Compare and checks with the user's stored password
      Returns:
      true if the stored and entered password are the same, false otherwise
